Meta.title: The Skyreader's Guild
Meta.author: mistermeagle
Meta.description:
Find an invitation to the lost Skyreader's Guild in lvl 15+ nefias. Watch for meteors, analyze them, and use the astrological codex to alter items and summon bosses. Search for those affected by contact and cleanse them.
A new friend, items, and activities are included. Meteor activity begins 1 game year after beginning the game.
